village_square.name: Village Square
village_square.description: The bustling center of the village, filled with market stalls and townsfolk.
village_square.look_around_text: You see villagers going about their daily routines, children playing, and merchants calling out their wares.

village_gate.name: Village Gate
village_gate.description: The main entrance to the village, guarded by two sturdy wooden doors.
village_gate.look_around_text: The gate stands tall, with guards keeping a watchful eye on anyone entering or leaving the village.

blacksmith_forge.name: Blacksmith's Shop
blacksmith_forge.description: A small workshop filled with the sound of hammering metal and the smell of burning coal.
blacksmith_forge.look_around_text: You see various weapons and armor displayed around the shop, with a sturdy forge blazing in the corner.

forest_path.name: Forest Path
forest_path.description: A narrow path winding through the dense trees of the enchanted forest.
forest_path.look_around_text: The trees tower above you, their leaves whispering in the gentle breeze. You can hear the distant sounds of magical creatures.
